multi_task_initialization_guide.critical_rule:
Teams MUST properly initialize the multi-task memory bank system before concurrent development. System will auto-detect tasks from git branches and auto-create task contexts. Developers must update task contexts as they work and commit context updates at least daily.
This is the AUTHORITATIVE guide for multi-task setup and daily workflows.
multi_task_initialization_guide.overview: Complete multi-task initialization and usage guide defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/universal/multi-task-initialization-guide.md
multi_task_initialization_guide.includes: - Quick start for team leads and developers - Phase 1: Shared context initialization (5 steps) - Phase 2: Task context creation (automatic) - Daily workflow for developers (morning/during/end-of-day) - Task completion workflow - Collaboration patterns (handoff/collaborative/review/dependencies) - Best practices and troubleshooting - Migration from single-tier system - Team lead responsibilities - Success metrics
